pageContext.claim: “At a recent round table meeting of business executives, & long after formally introducing Tim Cook of Apple, I quickly referred to Tim + Apple as Tim/Apple as an easy way to save time & words. The Fake News was disparagingly all over this, & it became yet another bad Trump story!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump said "Tim Apple" instead of "Tim Cook" while referring to the CEO of Apple. It was an innocent mistake. Whatever. But this revisionist tweet laying out in finicky detail how the president was supposedly trying to save a nanosecond or two by eliding the word "Cook" smacks of nonsense.
